# R4GoodPersonalFinances

> *Make Optimal Financial Decisions*

The `R4GoodPersonalFinances` R package is a set of tools designed to
help you plan and make informed, data-driven decisions for your personal
or household finances.  
These tools are selected carefully to align with academic consensus,
bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical
application. They assist you in:

- finding optimal asset allocation,
- preparing for retirement or financial independence,
- calculating optimal spending,
- and more.

## Installation

### Installation from CRAN

The latest stable version of the package released on CRAN can be
installed with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("R4GoodPersonalFinances")
```

### Installation from GitHub

You can install the latest version of R4GoodPersonalFinances from
[GitHub](https://github.com/R4GoodAcademy/R4GoodPersonalFinances) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("R4GoodAcademy/R4GoodPersonalFinances")
```

### Installation from R-universe

You can install the package from
[R-universe](https://r4goodacademy.r-universe.dev/R4GoodPersonalFinances)
also as `WebAssembly` (WASM) binaries for use in WebR applications:

``` r
install.packages(
  "R4GoodPersonalFinances", 
  repos = c(
    "https://r4goodacademy.r-universe.dev", 
    "https://cloud.r-project.org"
  )
)
```

## Acknowledgments

- Haghani V., White J. (2023) *The Missing Billionaires: A Guide to
  Better Financial Decisions*. `ISBN:9781119747918`.
- Idzorek, Thomas M., and Paul D. Kaplan. (2024) *Lifetime Financial
  Advice: A Personalized Optimal Multilevel Approach*. CFA Institute
  Research Foundation. `ISBN:9781952927379`.
- Milevsky, Moshe. (2020) *Retirement Income Recipes in R: From Ruin
  Probabilities to Intelligent Drawdowns*. Springer.
  `doi.org/10.1007/978-3-030-51434-1`.

## R for Good Academy ![](reference/figures/r4ga-logo.png)

The `R4GoodPersonalFinances` R package is part of the *R for Good
Academy* project. You can find there free resources explaining in
details concepts of personal finances implemented in this R package.

- See more:
  [www.r4good.academy](https://www.r4good.academy/en/blog.html#category=R4GoodPersonalFinances)

The official package documentation can be found here:  
[r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/)

> *Make Optimal Financial Decisions* with the `R4GoodPersonalFinances` R
> package!

# Package index

## All functions

- [`Household`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/Household.md)
  : Household class
- [`HouseholdMember`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/HouseholdMember.md)
  : HouseholdMember class
- [`R4GoodPersonalFinances`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/R4GoodPersonalFinances-package.md)
  [`R4GoodPersonalFinances-package`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/R4GoodPersonalFinances-package.md)
  : R4GoodPersonalFinances: Make Optimal Financial Decisions
- [`get_cache_info()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/cache.md)
  [`reset_cache()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/cache.md)
  [`set_cache()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/cache.md)
  : Working with cache
- [`calc_effective_tax_rate()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_effective_tax_rate.md)
  : Calculate Effective Tax Rate
- [`calc_gompertz_joint_parameters()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_gompertz_joint_parameters.md)
  : Calculating the Gompertz model parameters for joint survival
- [`calc_gompertz_parameters()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_gompertz_parameters.md)
  : Calculating Gompertz model parameters
- [`calc_gompertz_survival_probability()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_gompertz_survival_probability.md)
  : Calculating Gompertz survival probability
- [`calc_life_expectancy()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_life_expectancy.md)
  : Calculate Life Expectancy
- [`calc_optimal_asset_allocation()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_optimal_asset_allocation.md)
  : Calculate optimal asset allocation
- [`calc_optimal_risky_asset_allocation()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_optimal_risky_asset_allocation.md)
  : Calculate optimal risky asset allocation
- [`calc_portfolio_parameters()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_portfolio_parameters.md)
  : Calculate Portfolio Parameters
- [`calc_purchasing_power()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_purchasing_power.md)
  : Calculate purchasing power
- [`calc_retirement_ruin()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_retirement_ruin.md)
  : Calculating retirement ruin probability
- [`calc_risk_adjusted_return()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/calc_risk_adjusted_return.md)
  : Calculate risk adjusted return
- [`create_portfolio_template()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/create_portfolio_template.md)
  : Create Portfolio Template
- [`format_currency()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/format.md)
  [`format_percent()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/format.md)
  : Printing currency values or percentages
- [`get_current_date()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/get_current_date.md)
  : Get current date
- [`get_default_gompertz_parameters()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/get_default_gompertz_parameters.md)
  : Get default Gompertz parameters
- [`life_tables`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/life_tables.md)
  : HMD life tables
- [`plot_expected_allocation()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_expected_allocation.md)
  : Plot expected allocation over household life cycle
- [`plot_expected_capital()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_expected_capital.md)
  : Plot expected capital over household life cycle
- [`plot_future_income()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_future_income.md)
  : Plot future income structure over household life cycle
- [`plot_future_saving_rates()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_future_saving_rates.md)
  : Plotting future saving rates
- [`plot_future_spending()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_future_spending.md)
  : Plot future spending structure over household life cycle
- [`plot_gompertz_calibration()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_gompertz_calibration.md)
  : Plotting the results of Gompertz model calibration
- [`plot_joint_survival()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_joint_survival.md)
  : Plotting the results of Gompertz model calibration for joint
  survival
- [`plot_life_expectancy()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_life_expectancy.md)
  : Plot life expectancy of household members
- [`plot_optimal_portfolio()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_optimal_portfolio.md)
  : Plot optimal portfolio allocations
- [`plot_purchasing_power()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_purchasing_power.md)
  : Plotting changes to the purchasing power over time
- [`plot_retirement_ruin()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_retirement_ruin.md)
  : Plotting retirement ruin
- [`plot_risk_adjusted_returns()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_risk_adjusted_returns.md)
  : Plotting risk adjusted returns
- [`plot_scenarios()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_scenarios.md)
  : Plot scenarios metrics
- [`plot_survival()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/plot_survival.md)
  : Plot survival of household members
- [`read_hmd_life_tables()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/read_hmd_life_tables.md)
  : Reading HMD life tables
- [`render_scenario_snapshot()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/render_scenario_snapshot.md)
  : Rendering a scenario snapshot
- [`run_app()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/run_app.md)
  : Run a package app
- [`simulate_scenario()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/simulate_scenario.md)
  : Simulate a scenario of household lifetime finances
- [`simulate_scenarios()`](https://r4goodacademy.github.io/R4GoodPersonalFinances/reference/simulate_scenarios.md)
  : Simulate multiple scenarios of household lifetime finances
